snippet.title: Assassin’s Creed Valhalla: Gameplay Overview Trailer
snippet.description:
Discover more about the world of Assassin's Creed Valhalla, with new features, such as Assaults and Raids, and see more of our visceral combat system.

 Assassin’s Creed Valhalla available 17th November 2020 on Xbox One, PlayStation®4 system, Epic Games, Uplay & Stadia.
 Also coming to Xbox Series X and PlayStation®5. Pre-order now at https://www.assassinscreed.com/buy

Pre-order now and get an additional mission: The Way of the Berserker

Follow Assassin’s Creed:
WEBSITE: https://www.assassinscreed.com
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/assassinscreed
TWITTER: https://www.twitter.com/assassinscreed
